name: Camp Perdido
description:
Try to escape the ever changing Lost Camp!

You been left behind in camp, the creeps are out try reaching the end of the camp before the creeps get you.

You'll need money to get home, collect money from the creeps!

Click on the tiles to move, click on the enemies to attack you have an action bar.

Everytime you move or attack the Action bar depletes.

Find a purple looking square that's the exit.

Missing "

Sound

Music

Bug Check

lots of testing for balance

Cat Head - Power +1

Necklace Life +1

Rock Speed +1

Best played on 16:9

This is my first time doing a rougelike so i spend a bunch of time wasting time xD

There are plenty of bugs, i can't find any but im sure there are plenty.

Changed a bunch of stuff
